sentences.en: A : I would really appreciate it if you can proofread my CV for me.
sentences.cn: 如能帮忙看一下我的简历,感激不尽.

sentences.en: All the contents reposted have been proofread . Yet, we do not ensure they are all correct.
sentences.cn: 本站内容均经校对, 唯本站并不确保全部内容之正确无误.

sentences.en: Before handing in his application to his teacher, he proofread it again.
sentences.cn: 交给老师之前, 他又将申请书补正了一遍.

sentences.en: Could I get you to proofread my report?
sentences.cn: 我可以请你帮我校阅一下我的报告 吗 ?

sentences.en: I didn't even have the chance to proofread my own report.
sentences.cn: 我甚至没有机会校对自己的报告。
我已经校对完二十页了.
我应当校对一下我的手稿.

sentences.en: If there is any mistake in the textbooks, the mistake must be proofread and corrected immediately.
sentences.cn: 凡教材有误, 一定要及时勘正!

sentences.en: Objective: Our purpose was to proofread alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) activity factor ( K factor ) by hexokinase.
sentences.cn: 目的: 用己糖激酶法校正谷丙转氨酶 ( ALT ) 活性测定系数 ( Kfactor ).

sentences.en: Proofread and edited documents for clarity and grammar.
sentences.cn: 校对及编辑文件,以确定文意明确及文法正确.

sentences.en: Proofread your work and correct any mistakes you find.
sentences.cn: 校对你的工作并改正你所找到的错误.

sentences.en: Using the Caliper data to datum of electromagnetic flowmeter logging can proofread this error effectively.
sentences.cn: 文章介绍的电磁流量计与井径一体化仪将井径测量引入电磁流量计剖面测试中,可有效抑制此误差.

sentences.en: Writer must proofread work for any typographical or grammatical errors before submitting for consideration.
sentences.cn: 作家必须校对审议之前提交任何印刷或语法错误的工作.

trans.tran_en: to read through something that is written or printed in order to correct any mistakes in it
